title: divan/num2words causing `go get` failure
body:
I'm getting errors attempting to `go get` the project after a recent change possibly related to `divan/num2words`.

I tested in a Docker container to ensure I was working with a clean environment. Here is my test when `GO15VENDOREXPERIMENT=1`:

```
root@d33a963f53f2:/go# GO15VENDOREXPERIMENT=1 go get -u github.com/go-swagger/go-swagger/...
# cd .; git --git-dir=/go/src/github.com/go-swagger/go-swagger/.git submodule update --init --recursive
No submodule mapping found in .gitmodules for path 'vendor/github.com/divan/num2words'
package github.com/go-swagger/go-swagger/...: exit status 1
```

Here is my test when `GO15VENDOREXPERIMENT=0`:

```
root@d33a963f53f2:/go# GO15VENDOREXPERIMENT=0 go get -u github.com/go-swagger/go-swagger/...
package github.com/go-swagger/go-swagger/vendor/github.com/smartystreets/assertions
    imports github.com/smartystreets/assertions/internal/oglematchers: use of internal package not allowed
package github.com/go-swagger/go-swagger/vendor/github.com/smartystreets/assertions/internal/oglemock/createmock
    imports github.com/smartystreets/assertions/internal/oglemock/generate: use of internal package not allowed
package github.com/go-swagger/go-swagger/vendor/github.com/smartystreets/assertions/internal/oglemock/generate/test_cases
    imports github.com/smartystreets/assertions/internal/oglemock: use of internal package not allowed
package github.com/go-swagger/go-swagger/vendor/github.com/smartystreets/assertions/internal/oglemock/generate/test_cases
    imports github.com/smartystreets/assertions/internal/oglemock/generate/test_cases/complicated_pkg: use of internal package not allowed
package github.com/go-swagger/go-swagger/vendor/github.com/smartystreets/assertions/internal/oglemock/generate/test_cases
    imports github.com/smartystreets/assertions/internal/oglemock/generate/test_cases/renamed_pkg: use of internal package not allowed
package github.com/go-swagger/go-swagger/vendor/github.com/smartystreets/assertions/internal/ogletest
    imports github.com/smartystreets/assertions/internal/ogletest/srcutil: use of internal package not allowed
package github.com/go-swagger/go-swagger/vendor/github.com/smartystreets/assertions/internal/ogletest
    imports github.com/smartystreets/assertions/internal/reqtrace: use of internal package not allowed
package github.com/go-swagger/go-swagger/vendor/github.com/smartystreets/assertions/internal/ogletest/test_cases
    imports github.com/smartystreets/assertions/internal/ogletest: use of internal package not allowed
package github.com/go-swagger/go-swagger/vendor/github.com/smartystreets/assertions/internal/ogletest/test_cases
    imports github.com/smartystreets/assertions/internal/ogletest/test_cases/mock_image: use of internal package not allowed
```
